channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "RVM 2.0 A Ruby Environment Manager in Ruby"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "RVM 2.0 A Ruby Environment Manager in Ruby"

item.title: Suggestion from rilian (@rilian)
item.description: Would be nice to hear practical advices of pros and cons of * using binary rubies * how to smoothly migrate and rollback to new Ruby versions * what is the latest best practice of using .rvmrc VS .ruby-version, .ruby-gemset and how you manage them (in repo?) across the team working on multiple projects

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: RVM2 will emulate the RVM1 interface so the usage should be the same, this is intended to show more internal details, if you like a talk on using RVM in different situations like development, production, deployment - I could propose a separate proposal for it.

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description: So is this talk more about how RVM is structured and how it can be extended as opposed to how to use it?
